channel.title: Posts on Alt_F4
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Alt_F4

item.title: Death is nothing at all
item.description: Death is nothing at all. It does not count. I have only slipped away into the next room. Nothing has happened. Everything remains exactly as it was. I am I, and you are you, and the old life that we lived so fondly together is untouched, unchanged. Whatever we were to each other, that we are still. Call me by the old familiar name. Speak of me in the easy way which you always used.

item.title: Here we go
item.description: altf4.space Like closing a window, insert a space and starting again and again. A new start, fresh air. A soul has leaved us…I want to celebrate this with a new opened window. altf4.space will be used to go indeep on everything related to technology, life hacks, thoughts, trekking, sports, nutritions and so on. So everything that sparke me a brain movements and life happiness.
